sources.title: Anna Lucasta
sources.description: Title: Anna Lucasta Summary: A young woman who is disowned by her alcoholic father turns to prostitution to support herself; her scheming brother-in-law devises a plan to marry her off and make some money in the process. Directed by: Irving Rapper Actors: Paulette Goddard, William Bishop, John Ireland Production Company: Security Pictures Release Date: 11 July 1949 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 Color: Black and White

metadata.Plot: Anna Lucasta (Paulette Goddard)is disowned by her cruel father, Joe Lucasta (Oskar Homolka) and turns into a disillusioned, despondent and wayward girl who becomes a prostitute and sinks to the depths of degradation. But she is reclaimed and reformed by the man she marries, Rudolf Strobel (William Bishop).
metadata.Actors: Paulette Goddard, William Bishop, John Ireland
